title: Money spent on higher education in Asia in 2010
summary: This chart focuses on expressing the Money spent on higher education in Asia 2010 .
the chart shows that in Asia this was around £ 320 million during this time period .
This is compared to North_America which spent £ 200 million , Europe spending £ 100 million and Africa spending £ 50 million during the same time period .
gold: This graph explores the money spent on higher education in Asia in 2010 . The amount is in millions pounds . Asia spent £ 320 m which is 3 x more than europes total of £ 100 m .
